verses.verse: Then I looked,<WH7200> and see,<WH7549> in the expanse that was over the head<WH7218> of the cherubim<WH3742> there appeared<WH7200> above them as it were a sapphire<WH5601> stone,<WH68> as the appearance<WH4758> of the likeness<WH1823> of a throne.<WH3678>

He spoke<WH559> to the man<WH376> clothed<WH3847> in<WH935> linen,<WH906> and said,<WH559> Go in<WH935> between<WH996> the whirling wheels,<WH1534> even under the cherub,<WH3742> and fill<WH4390> both your hands<WH2651> with coals<WH1513> of fire<WH784> from between<WH996> the cherubim,<WH3742> and scatter<WH2236> them over the city.<WH5892> He went in as I watched.<WH935>
Now the cherubim<WH3742> stood<WH5975> on the right side<WH3225> of the house,<WH1004> when the man<WH376> went in;<WH935> and the cloud<WH6051> filled<WH4390> the inner<WH6442> court.<WH2691>

The glory<WH3519> of Yahweh<WH3068> mounted up<WH7311> from the cherub,<WH3742> and stood over the threshold<WH4670> of the house;<WH1004> and the house<WH1004> was filled<WH4390> with the cloud,<WH6051> and the court<WH2691> was full<WH4390> of the brightness<WH5051> of Yahweh<WH3068>'s glory.<WH3519>
The sound<WH6963> of the wings<WH3671> of the cherubim<WH3742> was heard<WH8085> even to the outer<WH2435> court,<WH2691> as the voice<WH6963> of God<WH410> Almighty<WH7706> when he speaks.<WH1696>

It came to pass,<WH6680> when he commanded the man<WH376> clothed<WH3847> in linen,<WH906> saying,<WH559> Take<WH3947> fire<WH784> from between the whirling wheels,<WH1534> from between the cherubim,<WH3742> that he went in,<WH935> and stood<WH5975> beside<WH681> a wheel.<WH212>

The cherub<WH3742> stretched forth<WH7971> his hand<WH3027> from between the cherubim<WH3742> to the fire<WH784> that was between the cherubim,<WH3742> and took<WH5375> of it,<WH5414> and put it into the hands<WH2651> of him who was clothed<WH3847> in linen,<WH906> who took<WH3947> it and went out.<WH3318>
There appeared<WH7200> in the cherubim<WH3742> the form<WH8403> of a man<WH120>'s hand<WH3027> under their wings.<WH3671>

I looked,<WH7200> and behold,<WH702> four wheels<WH212> beside<WH681> the cherubim,<WH3742> one<WH259> wheel<WH212> beside<WH681> one<WH259> cherub,<WH3742> and another<WH259> wheel<WH212> beside<WH681> another<WH259> cherub;<WH3742> and the appearance<WH4758> of the wheels<WH212> was like<WH5869> a beryl<WH8658> stone.<WH68>
As for their appearance,<WH4758> the four<WH702> of them had one<WH259> likeness,<WH1823> like a wheel<WH212> within<WH8432> a wheel.<WH212>

When they went,<WH3212> they went<WH3212> in their four<WH702> directions:<WH7253> they didn't<WH5437> turn as they went,<WH3212> but to the place<WH4725> where the head<WH7218> looked<WH6437> they followed<WH3212> it;<WH5437> they didn't turn as they went.<WH3212>

Their whole body,<WH1320> and their backs,<WH1354> and their hands,<WH3027> and their wings,<WH3671> and the wheels,<WH212> were full<WH4392> of eyes<WH5869> all around,<WH5439> even the wheels<WH212> that the four of them had.<WH702>
As for the wheels,<WH212> they were called<WH7121> in my hearing,<WH241> the whirling wheels.<WH1534>

Every one<WH259> had four<WH702> faces:<WH6440> the first<WH259> face<WH6440> was the face<WH6440> of the cherub,<WH3742> and the second<WH8145> face<WH6440> was the face<WH6440> of a man,<WH120> and the third<WH7992> face the face<WH6440> of a lion,<WH738> and the fourth<WH7243> the face<WH6440> of an eagle.<WH5404>
The cherubim<WH3742> mounted up:<WH7426> this is the living creature<WH2416> that I saw<WH7200> by the river<WH5104> Chebar.<WH3529>

When the cherubim<WH3742> went,<WH3212> the wheels<WH212> went<WH3212> beside them;<WH681> and when the cherubim<WH3742> lifted up<WH5375> their wings<WH3671> to mount up<WH7311> from the earth,<WH776> the wheels<WH212> also<WH1992> didn't<WH5437> turn from beside them.<WH681>
When they stood,<WH5975> these stood;<WH5975> and when they mounted up,<WH7311> these mounted up<WH7426> with them:<WH7307> for the spirit of the living creature was in them.<WH2416>
The glory<WH3519> of Yahweh<WH3068> went forth<WH3318> from over the threshold<WH4670> of the house,<WH1004> and stood<WH5975> over the cherubim.<WH3742>

The cherubim<WH3742> lifted up<WH5375> their wings,<WH3671> and mounted up<WH7426> from the earth<WH776> in my sight<WH5869> when they went forth,<WH3318> and the wheels<WH212> beside<WH5980> them:<WH5975> and they stood at the door<WH6607> of the east<WH6931> gate<WH8179> of Yahweh<WH3068>'s house;<WH1004> and the glory<WH3519> of the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> was over them above.<WH4605>
This is the living creature<WH2416> that I saw<WH7200> under the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> by the river<WH5104> Chebar;<WH3529> and I knew<WH3045> that they were cherubim.<WH3742>
Every one<WH259> had four<WH702> faces,<WH6440> <WH259> and every one<WH259> four<WH702> wings;<WH3671> and the likeness<WH1823> of the hands<WH3027> of a man<WH120> was under their wings.<WH3671>

As for the likeness<WH1823> of their faces,<WH6440> they were the<WH1992> faces<WH6440> which I saw<WH7200> by the river<WH5104> Chebar,<WH3529> their appearances<WH4758> and themselves;<WH3212> they went every one<WH376> straight<WH5676> forward.<WH6440>
